    Package Description
    net.antidot.paf
    Main PaF filters package with all interface definitions.

      void Handle.send_if_new(Document document)
      Send a document to the next filter or ack him EOL if no next filter only if document is not referenced in the PaF scheduler.
      void Handle.send_if_new(Document document, String destination_filter_uri)
      Send a document to the filter in parameter, or ack him EOL if destination uri is empty only if document is not referenced in the PaF scheduler.
      void Handle.send(Document document)
      Send a document to the next filter or ack him EOL if no next filter.
      void Handle.send(Document document, String destination_filter_uri)
      Send a document to the filter in parameter, or ack him EOL if destination uri is empty.
      void Handle.sync(Document document)
      Save the document and do not send it to anyone.
      Method parameters in net.antidot.paf with type arguments of type Document 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Handle.send_if_new(Collection<Document> documents)
      Send a collection of documents to the next filter, or ack them EOL if no next filter only if document is not referenced in the PaF scheduler.

      Send a collection of documents to the next filter, or ack them EOL if destination uri is empty only if document is not referenced in the PaF scheduler.

      Send a collection of documents to the next filter, or ack them EOL if no next filter.
